properties.name: Civic coliseum -Ringling Brothers Barnum & Bailey Circus
properties.description: Posted by KrickettÂ knoxville, TN 37915Ringling Brothers Circus - was not what it was when I was little, but Krickett still enjoyed it!

properties.name: Dollywood
properties.description: Posted by Krickett1020 Dollywood Lane, Pigeon Forge, TN 37863DollyWood is a short drive, but are lots of rides, attraction, and food. There are a few kiddy rides, but we enjoyed it although there was not much Krickett could ride.

properties.name: Fountain City Park
properties.description: Posted by KrickettFountain city park has a large swing area great for children. The park is located next to a duck pond, due to people over fishing and litering the area not many ducks or fish are still there. Krickett liked the giant fountain in the middle of the pond all the same!

properties.name: Knoxville Zoological Park
properties.description: Posted by KrickettThe Knoxville Zoo has lots(some) of exotic animals, local animals. Camels to ride, goats to pet. Kricket is always entertained!

properties.name: Ripley
properties.description: Posted by Krickett88 River Rd, Gatlinburg, TNKrickett was only 18 months at the time & did not really enjoy all the large fish! I am sure upon her next visit she will have a greater appreciation

properties.name: Starz Elite at the Bounce House
properties.description: Posted by Krickett914 Callahan Dr # Mthis place has those giant things you can jump on,with slides, and mazes. This place is made for children, I discovered I didnt fit so well in the maze!

properties.name: Toys R US
properties.description: Posted by Krickett3200 Knoxville Ctr DrToys \'R Us is a child\'s dream. I have always got so absorbed with all the toys that are made. So when there is nothing else to do we go to the toy store but you cant go in with no money! Krickett always expects to get new toys when we go!

properties.name: Trick or Treating
properties.description: Posted by Krickett5002 Trace Manor Lane knoxville tn 37912Trick or treating was an experience. Krickett did want to eat all the candy only unwrap it, more for me! She had fun in our neighborhood she wanted to play with the other children not actually go door to door. many more halloweens to come to get it right!

properties.name: Victor Ashe Park
properties.description: Posted by Krickett4901 Bradshaw Road Knoxville, TN 37912Living directly beside the Vicor Ashe Park has been great. There are sidewalks set up so we never have to drive there. There is the swing-set area, dog park, frisby golf, walking trails, and large fields all free to enjoy!

properties.name: Volunteer Landing Park
properties.description: Posted by KrickettThis park has lots of fountains for children to play & what kid doesn\'t love water
